reviewText: The only reason I don't like it is because it won't play on any of my DVD players.  I have 9 DVD players around the house and this won't play on any of them.  It's in DVD format, but I can't find which region it's for.
Cannot believe people don't love this original TV series! Bruce Lee Rocks as Kato

This is a bootleg set.  Everything from Banzai Video is a pirated product.  The quality of this is no better than the other bootleg sets on the gray market.  These discs have the episodes in random order.  Amazon sometimes blames third party sellers for illegal items on sale.  This is from them.  This is not a legal, licensed product and this series is not in the public domain.
There is a martial arts supply store in Memphis TN that sells these bootlegs discs for ten bucks each.
